name: Midnight Castle Succubus
summary: A succubus issues threats against humanity once every 100 years. While men die and young women disappear one by one, a succubus hunter visits a cursed city under the moonlight. Let’s rescue abducted girls and defeat the succubus! * 64 HCGs (25 newly drawn HCGs) * 36 H pixel animations (25 newly drawn H pixel animations)
info:
• 中文名: 午夜淫魔城
  • 发行日期: 2020年9月18日
  • 开发者: pixelteishoku,Libra Heart
